Package prj02

Class HuffmanCoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • prj02.HuffmanCoding
  • public class HuffmanCoding
extends java.lang.Object
    The Huffman Encoding Algorithm This is a data compression algorithm designed by David A. Huffman and published in 1952 What it does is it takes a string and by constructing a special binary tree with the frequencies of each character. This tree generates special prefix codes that make the size of each string encoded a lot smaller, thus saving space.
    Since:
    10/16/2021
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Fernando J. Bermudez Medina (Template), A. ElSaid (Review), James O Rodriguez Feliciano 802207604 (Implementation)

        public static java.lang.String load_data​(java.lang.String inputFile)
        Receives a file named in parameter inputFile (including its path), and returns a single string with the contents.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - name of the file to be processed in the path inputData/
        Returns:
        String with the information to be processed

      • compute_fd

        public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> compute_fd​(java.lang.String inputString)
        Processes inputString character by character and returns the corresponding frequency of occurrence of each character.
        Parameters:
        inputString - single line of string to determine symbol frequency
        Returns:
        Map of the symbols and their corresponding frequencies

      • huffman_tree

        public static Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> huffman_tree​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> fD)
        Constructs a huffman tree from a frequency destribution map.
        Parameters:
        fD - frequency distribution map.
        Returns:
        Binary tree node of the constructed huffman tree.

      • huffman_code

        public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> huffman_code​(Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> huffmanRoot)
        Creates a symbol to huffman code map.
        Parameters:
        huffmanRoot - the root of the created huffman tree.
        Returns:
        Map of each symbol mapped to their huffman code.

      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> encodingMap,
                                      java.lang.String inputString)
        Encodes the string using each symbol's corresponding huffman code
        Parameters:
        encodingMap - map that contains the symbols mapped to their huffman code
        inputString - the string to be encoded
        Returns:
        Encoded String

      • process_results

        public static void process_results​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> fD,
                                   HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> encodedHuffman,
                                   java.lang.String inputData,
                                   java.lang.String output)
        Receives the frequency distribution map, the Huffman Prefix Code HashTable, the input string, and the output string, and prints the results to the screen (per specifications). Output Includes: symbol, frequency and code. Also includes how many bits has the original and encoded string, plus how much space was saved using this encoding algorithm
        Parameters:
        fD - Frequency Distribution of all the characters in input string
        encodedHuffman - Prefix Code Map
        inputData - text string from the input file
        output - processed encoded string

        Auxiliary Method that decodes the generated string by the Huffman Coding Algorithm Used for output Purposes
        Parameters:
        output - - Encoded String
        lookupTable -
        Returns:
        The decoded String, this should be the original input string parsed from the input file
